offences.title: Exceed a variable speed limit - automatic camera device
offences.summary: On 22/07/2019 at Sheffield in the county of South Yorkshire drove a mechanically propelled vehicle, being a vehicle, namely BMW index KLSO123, on a special road, namely M18-2234A J12 J13 Northbound, subject of regulations, namely The M18 Motorway (Junctions 12 to 23) (Variable Speed Limits) Regulations 2015, at a speed exceeding 70 miles per hour
offences.contraryToActAndSection: Contrary to the above regulations and section 17(2), (3) and (4) of the Road Traffic Regulation Act 1984 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988
offences.statementOfFact: At 02:35 on 22/07/2019 the defendant drove a mechanically propelled vehicle, being a vehicle, namely BMW index KLSO123, on a special road, namely M18-2234A J12 J13 Northbound, subject of regulations, namely The M18 Motorway (Junctions 12 to 13) (Variable Speed Limits) Regulations 2015, at a speed exceeding 70 miles per hour. The speed, recorded by means of HAD20495 Highways Agency Digital Enforcement Camera System 9, was 86 mph.
offences.adjournedReason: To consider if there are mitigating circumstances (including exceptional hardship) for not ordering disqualification

offences.title: Speeding - motor vehicle - exceed 60 mph - automatic camera device

offences.contraryToActAndSection: Contrary to the above regulations and section 17(2), (3) and (4) of the Road Traffic Regulation Act 1984 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988
offences.statementOfFact: At 02:35 on 22/07/2019 the defendant drove a mechanically propelled vehicle, being a vehicle, namely FORD index JUSO123, on a special road, namely M18-2234A J12 J13 Northbound, subject of regulations, namely The M18 Motorway (Junctions 12 to 13) (Variable Speed Limits) Regulations 2015, at a speed exceeding 70 miles per hour. The speed, recorded by means of HAD20495 Highways Agency Digital Enforcement Camera System 9, was 86 mph.
offences.adjournedReason: To consider if there are mitigating circumstances (including exceptional hardship) for not ordering disqualification

offences.contraryToActAndSection: section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.
offences.adjournedReason: For a pre-sentence report to be prepared.

offences.title: Fail to surrender to police / court bail at the appointed time
offences.summary: On 11/05/2019 at Sheffield Magistrates Court failed without reasonable cause to surrender to custody at Sheffield Magistrates' Court, having been released on bail in criminal proceedings on 23/03/2019 at Sheffield Magistrates Court
offences.contraryToActAndSection: section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.
offences.adjournedReason: For a pre-sentence report to be prepared.

offences.title: Parent of child of compulsory school age registered at a school who failed to attend regularly
offences.summary: Between 05/12/2008 30/09/2012 at SHEFFIELD SOUTH YORKSHIRE lyou were the parent of FRED BUNNY a child of compulsory sch age, namely 13, who was registered at COVE SCHOOL and failed to attend regularly at that school.
offences.contraryToActAndSection: Contrary to section 444(1) and (8) of the Education Act 1996.

offences.title: Contravene/fail to comply with EU provision concerning food safety and hygiene
offences.summary: On 23/10/2017 at Main Hotel, Rotherham, S46 6BT in the county of Hampshire contravened or failed to comply with a provision of Regulation 178/2002 that was specified in column 1 of Schedule 2 to the Food Safety and Hygiene (England) Regulations 2013 and whose subject matter was described in column 2 of that Schedule, namely Regulation 19(1) Food Safety and Hygiene (England) Regulations 2013 and Regulation (EC) 852/2004 Chapter II Article 5 Para 1 and 2 in that failed to have procedures based on HACCP principles in that you failed to have a documented food safety management system in place.
offences.contraryToActAndSection: Contrary to regulation 19(1) and (2) of the Food Safety and Hygiene (England) Regulations 2013.

offences.contraryToActAndSection: In accordance with regulation 34 of the Council Tax (Administration and Enforcement) Regulations
